# UIImage.SymbolScale.default

**Case**

The default scale variant that matches the system usage.

## Declaration

```swift
case `default`
```

## Discussion

UIKit chooses the same scale used for similar content in other parts of the system.

## Symbol image scales

- **UIImage.SymbolScale.unspecified**: An unspecified scale.
- **UIImage.SymbolScale.small**: The small variant of the symbol image.
- **UIImage.SymbolScale.medium**: The medium variant of the symbol image
- **UIImage.SymbolScale.large**: The large variant of the symbol image.

items.description: The small variant of the symbol image.
